document.masterDocTitle: Key to the world species of Ernogamasus Athias-Henriot, 1971 (Parasitiformes Parasitidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Key to the world species of Ernogamasus Athias-Henriot, 1971 (Parasitiformes Parasitidae)

heading.emphasis:
List of
Ernogamasus
species (in alphabetic order, known sex, the original name, and general locality):

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Ernogamasus acutus ( Greim, 1969 )
– female, male
Pergamasus acutus Greim, 1969
(in
Holzmann 1969: 46
); Germany : ant nests

Ernogamasus afobeus ( Athias-Henriot, 1970 )
– female, male
Pergamasus ( Paragamasus ) afobeus Athias-Henriot, 1970: 23
; Austria

Pergamasus aliitectatus Athias-Henriot, 1967: 176
; former Czechoslovakia ( Athias-Henriot 1967 ) and Poland ( Witaliński & Fend’a 2020 )

Ernogamasus bicorniger ( Witaliński, 1977 )
– female, male
Leptogamasus bicorniger Witaliński, 1977: 515
; Poland

Ernogamasus byxus ( Athias-Henriot, 1970 )
– female, male
Pergamasus ( Paragamasus ) byxus Athias-Henriot, 1970: 19
; Austria : Steiermark

Ernogamasus callicrus ( Athias-Henriot, 1967 )
– female, male
Pergamasus callicrus Athias-Henriot, 1967: 174
; former Czechoslovakia

Pergamasus cuneoliger Athias-Henriot, 1967: 175
; former Czechoslovakia , Poland : Ojców National Park ( Witaliński 1979 )

Ernogamasus decui ( Juvara-Bals, 1974 )
– female, male
Leptogamasus ( Ernogamasus ) decui Juvara-Bals, 1974: 31
; Romania

Ernogamasus deminipes ( Athias-Henriot, 1967 )
– male
Pergamasus deminipes Athias-Henriot, 1967: 175
; former Czechoslovakia

Ernogamasus drassus ( Athias-Henriot, 1970 )
– female, male
Pergamasus ( Paragamasus ) drassus Athias-Henriot, 1970: 26
; Austria

Ernogamasus echinatus ( Micherdziński, 1969 )
– female
Pergamasus echinatus Micherdziński, 1969: 215
; Southern Poland

Ernogamasus fagavus ( Athias-Henriot, 1970 )
– female
Pergamasus ( Paragamasus ) fagavus Athias-Henriot, 1970: 30
; Austria

Ernogamasus flabelliformis ( Holzmann, 1969 )
– female
Pergamasus ( Pergamasus ) flabelliformis Holzmann, 1969: 42
; Northern Italy

Ernogamasus geseleus ( Athias-Henriot, 1970 )
– male
Pergamasus ( Paragamasus ) geseleus Athias-Henriot, 1970: 30
; Austria

Ernogamasus gimescus ( Athias-Henriot, 1970 )
– female, male
Pergamasus ( Paragamasus ) gimescus Athias-Henriot, 1970: 26
; Austria

Ernogamasus glicus ( Athias-Henriot, 1970 )
– female
Pergamasus ( Paragamasus ) glicus Athias-Henriot, 1970: 32
; Austria

Ernogamasus inopspinatus ( Athias-Henriot, 1967 )
– female
Pergamasus inopspinatus Athias-Henriot, 1967: 166
; Spain

subSubSection.paragraph:
Ernogamasus leruthi (Cooremann, 1951)
– female, male
Pergamasus leruthi Cooremann, 1951: 5
; Romania

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Ernogamasus lobatus ( Willmann, 1951 )
– female, male
Amblygamasus lobatus Willmann, 1951: 101
; Austria , Germany ( Holzmann 1969 )

Ernogamasus mussus ( Athias-Henriot, 1970 )
– female, male
Pergamasus ( Paragamasus ) mussus Athias-Henriot, 1970: 26
; Austria : western Steiermark
Ernogamasus notigius ( Athias-Henriot, 1970 )
– female
Pergamasus ( Paragamasus ) notigius Athias-Henriot, 1970: 32
; Austria

Ernogamasus obesus ( Holzmann, 1969 )

Pergamasus ( Pergamasus ) obesus Holzmann, 1969: 41

Arroyo et al . 2008
)

Ernogamasus oxalis ( Karg, 1968 )
– male
Pergamasus oxalis Karg, 1968: 353
; Germany : The Harz Mts

subSubSection.paragraph:
Ernogamasus papilio Witaliński & Fend’a, 2020
– female, male

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Ernogamasus papilio Witaliński & Fend’a, 2020: 502
; North-eastern Slovakia : The Poloniny National Park, south-eastern Poland : The Bieszczady Mts

; Austria , Italy

Austria , The Alps
